game.name: Anxiety Arcade
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 키보드 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Anxiety Arcade is a short, surreal narrative game about living with anxiety — and how it feels when your own thoughts turn into puzzles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Anxiety Arcade is a short, surreal narrative game about living with anxiety — and how it feels when your own thoughts turn into puzzles.
